attributes.action: To have Coronation Gardens, Southfields SW18 locked up at night
attributes.additional_details: We have had burglaries, stolen vehicles recovered, drug dealing/ drug taking, drunken behaviour, - general antisocial behaviour. Sign this so we can present the petition to the council and have the Gardens closed again
attributes.background: The residents who's houses back onto or face Coronation Gardens SW18 would like to have The park closed to the public at night. The Gardens were locked before but Wandsworth Council made cut backs and the Gardens are open all night. This attracts antisocial behaviour and we want it to stop.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can find out how to petition the council here:

http://www.wandsworth.gov.uk/info/200315/have_your_say/910/petitions_to_the_council
